long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use Ryesnap to bring your content from anywhere on the web to Ryeboard!

Ryeboard is a part whiteboard, part cloud storage app that helps teams collect, manage, and share content in real-time. 

We created Ryesnap to make it easier to bring outside information and content into Ryeboard. Save any website you're on with a single click or write down your thoughts on a note and we'll get it ready for you to use on Ryeboard instantly!

=== Current Features ===
✓ Save websites as website cards
✓ Save notes as note cards
✓ Saved content automatically get saved to your dashboard
✓ You can also manually drag saved content out to specific boards

=== Upcoming features ===
* Upload and saves files
* Take screenshots and recordings
